doc.title: Correct Me If I'm Wrong
doc.plot: With Emmigration from the U.K at an all time high, compulsory contraception, and failing relationships the norm, the government set up a secret organization called the 'Relationship Correctional Services'. They're latest secret agent '72' (Adam to his mates), has just received his first assignment, and he's got to infiltrate her life, make her fall in love with him, assess her traits, correct her and dump her, all without her knowledge. Things don't quite go to plan!
